name: Pecan Icebox Cookies
description: Swapped at the SE Cookie Swap by Nick O'Neill and Rebecca O'Kaufman
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup firmly packed light brown sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Beat together butter and sugars at medium speed until smooth. Add egg and vanilla and beat. Combine flour, baking powder, and salt. Gradually add into sugar mixture. Stir in 1 cup pecans. Refrigerate until set up (firm).

Divide into quarters. Roll into logs. Place pecans onto wax
paper and wrap. Freeze 2 hours, or longer if you want to bake in small batches. They last quite some time in the freezer.
Cut into 1/2-inch thick rounds and bake at 350°F for 10-12 min on a lightly greased baking sheet until golden.
